'''Wisdom Orb Model''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The furnishing can be interacted with, and its animation can be enabled or disabled.

One copy of Wisdom Orb Model can be purchased from the event shop during the [[Fabulous Fungus Frenzy]] Event.
